Talon:

"Can we track the space bridge's signature and expand the search to=
 all Earth? "said Talon trying to not felt guilt

ps.com, Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:

t>

lame for it.  After all, it's

 that, we must find

> <NEW>
> 
> "Talon is right." LEO P=
RIME said, "Now is not the time for assigning
> blame. For now we need to l=
ock down the situation and sww what we can
> salvage." There was somehting =
more than anger in LEO's voice, it was
> concern. "From the reports I have =
read too many people have
> disappeared since we have arrived here. Let's s=
ee if we can find some
> of them."
> 
> They quickly enough find themselves=
 on the bridge. LEGACY is already
> there sitting at one of the consoles wh=
ile LORD ELDER and TORCA
> quickly follow behind TALON and STRAIGHT SHOT as=
 they enter.
> 
> "Legacy." LEO PRIME said as he turned to look at him. "Ac=
tivate the
> sensor logs for the past hour and give me a visual diplay of
>=
 Nightlight's energy signature."
> 
> There was a nod from LEGACY as the tu=
rned to complete the task.
> 
> On the main viewscreen an image of the ARK =
and the surrounding section
> is displayed. A dot representing NIGHTLIGHT's=
 signature is shown to be
> inside the ark, and then flying out of it, and =
travelling some
> distance. Her signature landing nearly 100 miles away in =
a loney
> isolated area.
> 
> "What is Nightlight doing out there?" LORD EL=
DER said, obviously not
> aware of what has been happening.
> 
> TORCA look=
ed similarly confused.
> 
> LEO held up his hand, "Just a moment." He said =
as he looked at LEGACY,
> "Speed us up until we come to the present or unti=
l something happens.
> 
> LEGACY nodded and the scene sped up and then slow=
ed down again as
> something like RODIMUS PRIME showed up on the screen, or=
 atleast an
> energy signature that looked much like his.
> 
> On the scree=
n the small dot that represented RODIMUS approached the
> dot that represen=
ted NIGHTLIGHT. They interacted for a moment and then
> they both vanished.=

> 
> "A teleoprtation device?" TORCA said as he looked at the screen.
> 
>=
 LEGACY peered at his console. "Perhaps." he siad in his typical cold
> voi=
ce. "The signature at their disappearance resembled a space bridge
> signat=
ure but on a much smaller scale and there were differences in it
> as well.=
"
> 
> TORCA grunted, "And that was probrably that Dark Rodimus again."
> 
=
> LEO PRIME nodded to TORCA and then looked around the room.
> "Suggestions=
 on how to find Nightlight now?"
